channel.title: Dam error help i aint got a clue! lol
channel.description:
im using cheezescape server just coz its my 1st time doina server and this comes up when i compile n e ideas u got more of a chance than me lol as u prob sont this manny times
'javac' is not reconized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. plz helpzorz!

item.title: Dam error help i aint got a clue! lol
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

How to set a classpath?

Open start menu > Right click ‘My computer’ > Properties > Advanced > Environment Variables > New (one at the top)

Variable name: [glow=red,2,300]CLASSPATH[/glow]

Variable value: [glow=red,2,300]SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.[/glow]

Then click Ok, ok again and then try

Read full topic

item.title: Dam error help i aint got a clue! lol
item.dc:creator: @erte8 erte8
item.description:
@erte8 wrote:

[quote=“ssosanchez, post:1, topic:13889”]im using cheezescape server just coz its my 1st time doina server and this comes up when i compile n e ideas u got more of a chance than me lol as u prob sont this manny times

‘javac’ is not reconized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
plz helpzorz![/quote]go to your compile and right click it and click edite delete the text that there and paste this there.
@echo off
Title “YOUR SERVER NAME” Compiler
color 07
echo Compiling…
“C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin\java.exe” server
color 03
echo Complete!

make sure you save it.
you must have new version of java cant remember link so ill send it in later.(dont type this in the server name ")

Read full topic
